biotools.summary: Comprehensive TF database; identified and classified all the genome-wide TFs in 50 sequenced animal genomes. Also collects transcription co-factors and chromatin remodeling factors of those genomes, which are also essential in the gene transcription regulation.

bioschemas.name: Animal Transcription Factor Database
bioschemas.summary: Comprehensive TF database; identified and classified all the genome-wide TFs in 50 sequenced animal genomes. Also collects transcription co-factors and chromatin remodeling factors of those genomes, which are also essential in the gene transcription regulation.
